vibesExplanation:
The workout is best classified as 'The Meditative Grind' and 'The Endorphin Wave' based on the provided metadata. The 'Weekly Conditioning Row' focuses on maintaining a steady 26 rhythm during 3-minute intervals, indicative of a repetitive and endurance-focused session characteristic of 'The Meditative Grind.' The emphasis on rhythm and endurance rowing aligns closely with the essence of zoning in and letting repetition take over. The inclusion of 'lobster facts' during the workout also adds a meditative, discovery element, enhancing this vibe.

The workout can also be considered an 'Endorphin Wave' as it is classified as a 'sweat, endurance' workout with a focus on maintaining a rhythm, implying a steady build-up of energy. The choice of music—Indie Alternative and Global Hits—supports an elevated energy and feel-good movement typical of this vibe. Mac's emphasis on a supportive and fun workout atmosphere with team energy further complements the idea of an endorphin-lifting experience. The assigned scores reflect a strong match based on these elements, with the Meditative Grind being slightly more dominant due to the session's endurance and rhythmic characteristics.
